EmailTemplate.name: MIPIM 2014 - Resi Lunch
EmailTemplate.subject: INVITATION: MIPIM 2014 - Lunch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’d love to catch up with you whilst we are at MIPIM this year and hope you can join us for a lunch with fellow RESI colleagues
Wednesday 12 March 2014
1.00pm
Plage L’Ondine La Croisette 06400 Cannes ______
RSVP by Monday 3 March Sharon.Madden@aecom.com +44 (0)7747 118766
